# Web Search Skill

A skill for searching the web and retrieving information.

## Description

Search the web for real-time information on any topic. Returns relevant results with snippets and URLs.

## Parameters

- `query` (string, required): The search query
- `max_results` (integer, optional): Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)
- `include_domains` (array, optional): Only include results from these domains

## When to Use

Use this skill when:
- User asks for current information
- User wants to find websites or resources
- User needs to verify facts from multiple sources
- User asks "search for", "find", "look up"

## Examples

- "Search for the latest news about AI"
- "Find restaurants near Times Square"
- "Look up Python documentation for asyncio"
